data.title: Duke Softball Stadium
data.meta_description: Duke Softball Stadium opened in 2017 and is the home to the Duke University softball team. The facility seats 500 with additional lawn spaces and includes three indoor batting cages.
data.text:
Located on the East Campus of Duke University since the fall of 2017, the Duke Softball Stadium is home to the newest addition to the Blue Devils athletics family, the Duke softball program. The dimensions of the field stretch 190 feet down the lines and 220 feet to center field. The stadium includes three indoor batting cages, a locker room, a team room, an athletic training area, conference room and a press box that features separate booths for radio crews, TV crews and working media.

Home to the Duke Blue Devils softball team

Seating for 500 with additional lawn spaces
